Advocate

PRIMARY CTA

Your voice can make a difference for hungry families!

TFBN advocates at the state and federal levels to protect and improve our nation’s response to hunger. You can join us three ways:

  • Become an advocate at Feeding America’s Hunger Action Center. TFBN will keep your information safe and use it to contact you when your voice is needed.
  • Follow us on Twitter and Facebook to get the latest news on hunger in Texas, and how you can help.
  • Learn more about hunger in your area, and share this information with decision-makers in your community.
Learn More
300 million lbs Of food distributed to over 3 million Texans in 2011

The Voices of Hungry Texans

Because of the economy, it is getting hard to supply enough food for the family.
Janice
Social security benefits not enough for rent, utilities, etc.
Max
We depend on food stamps for ourselves and our 2 boys. We struggled when they cut them previously, and could not make it if another cut happened.
Cheryl
I am a single mother with an income of minumum wage, trying to afford a place to live, left with no money for food.
Melissa
We depend on food stamps for ourselves and our 2 boys. We struggled when they cut them previously, and could not make it if another cut happened.
